name: Auberon: Conqueror
ability:
Veil.

name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel
ability:
Armor: 2
Deploy: Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.

name: Viy
ability: Deathwish: Shuffle Viy back into your deck, then increase its base power by 3.

name: Tir ná Lia
ability:
Resilience.

Order: Spawn and play Red Riders.

name: Hive Mind
ability:
Choose 3 different bronze Kikimore units.
While in your graveyard, the first time you Spawn a Drone on the battlefield each allied turn, Banish it and Summon the next chosen Kikimore unit from your deck in its place.

name: Weavess: Incantation
ability: Zeal. Order: Banish a bronze unit from your graveyard and boost self by its power, then Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row.

name: Dagon
ability:
Order: Consume an allied unit.
Every time you trigger a Deathwish ability, boost self by 1.
After triggering Deathwish of allied units at least 9 times, Summon self from your deck to your Melee row.

name: Brewess: Ritual
ability: Deathwish: Summon 2 random bronze Deathwish units from your deck to this row.

ability: Summon 2 non-Neutral units without Veil from your deck to an allied row, then give them Doomed and Rupture.

Thrive.

ability:
